Oops... Something broke.
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Curabitur ullamcorper turpis vel commodo scelerisque. Phasellus luctus nunc ut elit cursus, et imperdiet diam vehicula. Duis et nisi sed urna blandit bibendum et sit amet erat. Suspendisse potenti. Curabitur consequat volutpat arcu nec elementum. Etiam a turpis ac libero varius condimentum. Maecenas sollicitudin felis aliquam tortor vulputate, ac posuere velit semper.

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

[`amp-access-laterpay`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-access-laterpay-v0.2.md) allows publishers to easily integrate with the payment infrastructure platform [LaterPay](https://www.laterpay.net). It is based on, and requires [AMP Access](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-access-v0.1.md).
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

amp-access-laterpay allows publishers to easily integrate with the payment infrastructure platform LaterPay. It is based on, and requires AMP Access.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

[`amp-access-laterpay`](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-access-laterpay-v0.2.md) allows publishers to easily integrate with the payment infrastructure platform [LaterPay](https://www.laterpay.net). It is based on, and requires [AMP Access](/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-access-v0.1.md).

sections.doc_: Import the `amp-access` component in the header.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import the `amp-access` component in the header.

sections.doc_: `amp-access` requires `amp-analytics` to be imported as well.
sections.normalizedDoc_: `amp-access` requires `amp-analytics` to be imported as well.

sections.doc_: Add the configuration which specifies the vendor, and vendor specific configuration for `amp-access`
sections.normalizedDoc_: Add the configuration which specifies the vendor, and vendor specific configuration for `amp-access`

<body>

sections.doc_: This section is visible to all users. No special markup is needed in this case.
sections.code:
The Article

This is a preview of the article.
sections.preview:
The Article

This is a preview of the article.
sections.normalizedDoc_: This section is visible to all users. No special markup is needed in this case.

sections.doc_:
This section is only shown if the value of the `access` and `error` attributes
on the response for the authorization requests both evaluate to `FALSE`
The LaterPay dialog with the different purchase options will be rendered here
sections.code:
<section amp-access="NOT error AND NOT access"
  amp-access-hide>
sections.preview:
<section amp-access="NOT error AND NOT access"
    amp-access-hide>
sections.normalizedDoc_:
This section is only shown if the value of the `access` and `error` attributes
on the response for the authorization requests both evaluate to `FALSE`
The LaterPay dialog with the different purchase options will be rendered here

sections.doc_:
The id and class shown here are both predefined and should be kept as such
You can then use these as references to style the dialog to your needs.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
The id and class shown here are both predefined and should be kept as such
You can then use these as references to style the dialog to your needs.

sections.doc_:
This section is shown if an `error` attribute exists when getting the
the authorization request
sections.normalizedDoc_:
This section is shown if an `error` attribute exists when getting the
the authorization request

sections.doc_:
Use the `amp-access` attribute to control the visibility of each component. The expression
must evaluate to a boolean value. If it evaluates to `TRUE`, the section will be shown.

sections.normalizedDoc_:
Use the `amp-access` attribute to control the visibility of each component. The expression
must evaluate to a boolean value. If it evaluates to `TRUE`, the section will be shown.

document.head:
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>amp-access-laterpay</title>
  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-access-laterpay/index.html">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>

  <script async custom-element="amp-access" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-access-0.1.js"></script>
  <script async custom-element="amp-analytics" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-analytics-0.1.js"></script>
  <script async custom-element="amp-access-laterpay" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-access-laterpay-0.2.js"></script>

  <script id="amp-access" type="application/json">
  {
    "vendor": "laterpay",
    "laterpay": {
      "articleTitleSelector": ".preview > h3",
      "sandbox": true
    }
  }
  </script>

  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
document.title: amp-access-laterpay
document._description: amp-access-laterpay allows publishers to easily integrate with the payment infrastructure platform LaterPay.
